about_the_game:
Zombnami is a zombie survival game. In a post apocalyptic world where players have to run from a large horde of zombies coming down the road (the world is built around the central road), the players will have to permanently keep distance withe the zombie horde, find resources to survive and deal with different enemies on the way.

Features:

  • First and third person
  • Solo and online co-op
  • Fight with melee or guns
  • Hundreds of zombies
  • Civilian and army npcs
  • Vast and growing world
  • Different buildings to explore
  • Crafting system
  • Deal with hunger and thirst
  • Day and night cycle

Will you get to end of the road Alive?

name: Zombnami

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 64-bits
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements will be reviwed as development continues.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10 64-bits
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements will be reviwed as development continues.

short_description: Few years after the apocalypse, a tsunami of zombies is heading towards you! how far will you get?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
